name: In the Nick of Time
description:
My first attempt at making a first person shooter for a the GameDevHQ Community Jam 2022. You must save the girl before the train arrives than go after the boss. Avoid the defense posts as they will kill you if you get in their range.

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

R Click - Fire / L Click - Zoom

R - Reload

Esc - Pause Menu
